plot: Long ago in a land ravaged by strife, an ancient race of mages crafted the ultimate weapon to destroy their enemies, and end all wars. They called it the Aryx Orthian, the Scourge Of Worlds...
title: The Scourge of Worlds: A Dungeons & Dragons Adventure
